title: Bee Populations
text:
This app uses data from the 2022 Week 2 Tidy Tuesday event. It was built in collaboration with Karyn Brehmeyer.


Peek behind the curtain!
knitr::include_app("https://cartermcmahon.shinyapps.io/bee_safe/", height = "700")

title: Transit Infrastracture Costs per KM
text:
This app uses data from the 2021 Week 2 Tidy Tuesday event. It builds on the work of GitHub users jsakaluk and javendano58.


Peek behind the curtain!
knitr::include_app("https://cartermcmahon.shinyapps.io/Transit_Project/", height = "600")

title: Flesh and Blood TCG
text: This is a poster I made for a Data Engineering course. The database I constructed for the project is outlined in an Entity Relationship Diagram at the bottom of the poster.

title: About
text:
Carter is a student at Willamette University’s Master’s in Data Science program, and he is set to graduate in August 2023. He is also, in descending order of personal importance, a:

fiance
proponent of FOSS
player of board & video games
…
(everything else)
…
Scorpio

Carter is looking for a job at the moment, so if you are a potential employer interested in hiring him please reach out at his gmail address: carterwmcmahon.
